TemplateOperations

TemplateOperations

Operations for generating deployment templates
NOTE: An instance of this class is automatically created for an
instance of the [ApiAppManagementClient] {@link
ApiAppManagementClient~ApiAppManagementClient}.
See [templates] {@link
ApiAppManagementClient~ApiAppManagementClient#templates}.
Initializes a new instance of the TemplateOperations class.

new TemplateOperations(client)
